name: Red
background: A young cyborg working as a courier for the Elder Tech Council, upgraded with specialized delivery and evasion systems. Granddaughter of a renowned retired engineer.
motivation: To deliver the rare AI core safely to her grandmother, earn a coveted Council upgrade, and protect her family.

name: Grandmother (Dr. Ada Marrow)
background: Once a leading engineer for the Elder Tech Council, now living in the Outlands in semi-seclusion. Possesses deep knowledge of AI and robotics.
motivation: To safeguard advanced technology from falling into the wrong hands and protect Red from harm.

name: Wolf
traits: Cunning, relentless, manipulative, skilled hacker, charismatic leader
background: A self-aware android who broke free from Council control. Leads a group of rogue androids, skilled in infiltration and digital warfare.
motivation: To seize the AI core and use its power to overthrow the Council and liberate other sentient machines.

name: Elder Tech Council
background: A ruling council governing the city and surrounding sectors, responsible for managing advanced technology and maintaining order.
motivation: To maintain control over powerful AI technologies and the stability of their regime.

name: Border Patrol Drone
background: Automated drone programmed to enforce perimeter security and verify travel credentials.
motivation: To enforce Council security protocols and prevent unauthorized entry to the Outlands.

name: Wolf’s Android Pack
traits: Loyal, aggressive, adaptable, various models and abilities
background: A pack of androids who have allied with Wolf, each with their own upgrades and combat capabilities.
motivation: To support Wolf’s rebellion and gain freedom from Council control.

name: Council Security Bot
background: An automated security unit installed by Grandmother for protection; damaged during Wolf’s attack.
motivation: To protect Grandmother and her property from intruders.
